document.heading: Notice Requirement for Publicly Funded Building Projects Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-349, the “Notice Requirement for Publicly Funded Building Projects Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-635 which was referred to the Committee Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 21, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-743 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-349 became effective on April 13, 2005.
